https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bInP6Kopplc9JtEAPEoU4nrU5N5.jpg Youssef, a director in his fifties, is preparing a film and goes scouting in the south of Tunisia. He travels the region, records images, meets a beautiful shepherdess during his stay in a mysterious village, before getting lost in the night. Dance of the Wind
